title: Highlight Key Quotes
description: Extract significant quotes or statements from key figures mentioned in the news article, providing context for each quote.

title: Generate Counterarguments
description: Provide counterarguments or alternative perspectives to the views expressed in the news article.

title: Explain Historical Context
description: Provide historical context or background information relevant to the events or topics described in the news article.

title: Identify Policy Implications
description: Analyze the news article to identify potential policy changes or implications for governance, laws, or regulations.

title: Evaluate Economic Impact
description: Assess the potential economic consequences of the events described in the news article, identifying affected sectors or stakeholders.

title: Detect Emerging Risks
description: Analyze the news article to highlight new or emerging risks, including political, social, or environmental threats.

title: Summarize for Kids
description: Rewrite the news article into a simplified version suitable for younger audiences, focusing on clarity and comprehension.

title: Personalized Learning Guide
description: Create a learning guide from the news article, including key points, questions for reflection, and suggested further reading.

title: Analyze Public Sentiment
description: Assess how the public is reacting to the news article by analyzing social media trends, comments, or other feedback.

title: Cross-Compare Sources
description: Compare the coverage of this news article with other sources to identify inconsistencies, bias, or unique angles.

title: Analyze Geopolitical Impact
description: Identify the geopolitical implications of the news article, including impacts on international relations or global stability.

title: Extract Actionable Insights
description: Generate actionable insights based on the events described in the news article, tailored for decision-makers.

title: Create Investor Brief
description: Generate a brief for investors based on the news article, highlighting potential risks, opportunities, and market impacts.

title: Monitor Competitor Activities
description: Analyze the news article for mentions of competitors, identifying relevant actions or strategies they have undertaken.

title: Predict Social Impact
description: Predict the potential social impact of the events described in the news article, including changes in public opinion or behavior.

title: Generate a Q&A Summary
description: Turn the news article into a series of questions and answers for easier understanding and engagement.

title: Summarize Regional News
description: Create a summary of news articles from a specific region, highlighting key events and trends.

title: Expert Commentary
description: Assuming you are an expert in the field related to this news, provide your commentary and analysis on the implications of this news.

title: Generate FAQs
description: Create a list of frequently asked questions (FAQs) and answers based on the content of the news article.

title: Identify Ethical Concerns
description: Analyze the news article to identify potential ethical issues or dilemmas raised by the events or topics discussed.

title: Compare Historical Events
description: Identify historical parallels to the events described in the news article and analyze similarities or differences.

title: Generate Social Media Post
description: Create a concise and engaging social media post summarizing the news article for quick sharing.

title: Detect Cultural Context
description: Analyze the cultural context of the news article, identifying how cultural norms or values might influence its interpretation.

title: Highlight Contradictions
description: Identify any contradictions or inconsistencies within the news article or between this article and other sources.

title: Recommend Further Reading
description: Suggest related articles, research papers, or books that provide further context or information on the topic discussed.

title: Identify Market Trends
description: Analyze the news for emerging market trends, identifying potential opportunities or challenges for businesses.

title: Generate Infographic
description: Summarize the key points of the news article into an infographic format, making it visually appealing and easy to understand.

title: Identify Propaganda Techniques
description: Analyze the article for common propaganda techniques, such as bandwagoning, fear appeals, or emotional manipulation.

title: Summarize for Professionals
description: Create a professional summary of the news article tailored for specific industries or professional audiences.

title: Evaluate Environmental Impact
description: Assess the potential environmental consequences of the events described in the news article.

title: Analyze Public Health Implications
description: Identify potential public health risks or outcomes based on the events described in the news article.

title: Generate Debate Points
description: Create a list of debate points for and against the topic discussed in the news article, supporting each with evidence.

title: Summarize Breaking News
description: Provide a quick, real-time summary of breaking news, prioritizing the most urgent and impactful information.

title: Create Localized Summary
description: Generate a summary of the news article tailored to a specific region or audience, emphasizing local relevance.

title: Analyze Public Policies
description: Evaluate the implications of the news article on public policies, identifying potential changes or reforms.

title: Extract Technical Details
description: Identify and explain any technical or intricate details discussed in the news article, such as scientific or technological concepts.

title: Identify Stakeholders
description: List all the key stakeholders involved in the events described in the news article and their respective roles or interests.

title: Create Educational Summary
description: Turn the news article into an educational resource, providing structured information and key takeaways for students or learners.

title: Analyze Media Framing
description: Evaluate how the news article frames its narrative, identifying any specific angles, biases, or omissions in its presentation.

title: Provide Crisis Insights
description: Analyze the news article to provide insights into ongoing crises, including affected areas, populations, and potential resolutions.

title: Detect Fake News Indicators
description: Identify signs that the news article may contain fake or manipulated information, such as unverifiable claims or suspicious sources.
